content: Notes from our kick-off call yesterday have now been published: https://github.com/cds-hooks/cds-hooks/blob/master/meeting-minutes/2016-03-17.markdown
Thanks Kevin. Quite a lot of people joined that call!
That is quite the list for sure, and impressed Grahame was there given the timezone difference (as usual)

That's not too bad, my conversion didn't work so well. Wish I was on that call then.
The minutes look great, and I'm keen to get involved also.
(Just need more hours in the day ;))
